The three lives of NATO, born from a gamble, now deemed obsolete by Trump
subhead: Created out of America's desire to protect Europe from communism, the North Atlantic Alliance underwent profound changes after the fall of the Berlin Wall. It expanded and took on new missions, though it never fully proved its effectiveness. Today, it faces fierce challenges from Donald Trump.

Raphaël Glucksmann sets out policy platform for 2027 French presidential election
subhead: The member of the European Parliament laid out his party's 'vision for France' on Monday in Paris. The project, focused on Europe, the environment and a 'social contract,' aims to revive 'a pro-European and deeply democratic left.'

title: Lyon handed Ligue 2 relegation by financial regulator
subhead: Lyon can appeal the decision, but if their relegation is confirmed, they would be replaced in Ligue 1 by Reims.

title: A century of MI5 secrets are being revealed in the UK's National Archives
subhead: A unique exhibition traces the history of the legendary British domestic intelligence agency and features a wealth of original documents in a bid to maintain public trust and to counter conspiracy theories.

title: The challenges of a 'Pax Hebraica' in the Middle East
subhead: The bombing of Iran's main nuclear sites by the US marks the triumph of Israel, which in just a few months has become the sheriff of the Middle East, writes Le Monde columnist Gilles Paris.

title: The Heritage Foundation sets its sights on Europe
subhead: Since the beginning of his term, Donald Trump has been applying Project 2025, a 922-page bible written by the conservative think tank. Today, its president, Kevin Roberts, is looking across the Atlantic. On a visit to France, he met with leaders of far-right parties.

title: Venice locals protest Jeff Bezos's three-day wedding extravaganza
subhead: Residents of La Serenissima have formed a group to oppose the wedding of Amazon founder Jeff Bezos and journalist Lauren Sanchez, who have planned a ceremony set to take place between Thursday and Saturday.
